attributes.action: Repeal hanging laws for murder by knife,gun or assault,caught by procedure of Law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The number of murders in the last year has risen but still we put these criminals behind bars if caught.The law should be repealed to include the hanging of murderers in this Country,and whilst there behind bars my taxpayers monies is being used to keep them alive.If forensics prove the truth. Take a Life Lose your Own. Minimum Sentence for carrying such articles 10 years.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
